short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify Google Consent Mode, IAB TCF and GPP consent signals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ensure your website complies with Global Privacy Platform (GPP), IAB Transparency and Consent Framework (TCF), and Google Consent Mode standards. UniConsent Consent Data Validator Chrome plugin validates the CMP implementation  accurate capture and transmission of user consent data, ensuring seamless compliance and data integrity.

Key Features:

• Google Consent Mode v2 Validator: Confirms proper integration and data collection for Google Tags, Prebid.js, and Google Ads.
• IAB TCF v2 Consent Data Validator: Ensures compliance with IAB TCF by validating user consent data.
• GPP Consent Data Validator: Verifies accurate transmission and compliance with Global Privacy Platform guidelines.

Use this plugin to ensure your website's consent data aligns with major industry standards, providing a trustworthy user experience while meeting regulatory requirements.
